name: Sprite's Sojourn
description:
A short little Metroidvania-lite with a a moody atmosphere and not-so-well-hidden secrets.

Controls
Movement: A and D keys
Jump: Space Bar
Options: Escape key
Controller supported (but not tested)

3 (very simple) endings!

Credit Due
Base sprite assets provided by the Kenney 1-bit Pack. Much kitbashing was done after the fact in accordance with jam rules.

A portion of the game's music provided by The Cynic Project at pixelsphere.org. Bird audio provided by isaiah658. Both found on opengameart.org.

Made for MizJam1 2020 in under 48 hours.
